name: Space Gladiators
description:
Space Gladiators

Space Gladiators is the contest of the future with the largest audience, where contestants from all the galaxies participate for the pride of their planet, in this contest the participants will leave their skins competing against all kinds of creatures in different arenas. The video game consists in defending the nucleus, while trying to avoid that the enemies destroy it, on the other hand, the enemies can also eliminate you. Therefore, the player must be aware of both the protection of the nucleus and his own life. The player will have the possibility of obtaining different abilities, but to obtain them he must leave the central zone where the nucleus is, forcing the player to leave him defenseless in search of new abilities to counteract waves of enemies.

Company: Nautilus Studios.

Developers:

- Javier Ballesteros.

-  Arnulfo Ortegón.
